response.original_title: Behind the Castle Doors: The Origin of The Hilarious House of Frightenstein
response.overview: When the Markowitz brothers pitched their idea for a "pseudo-horror" TV show for kids, they promised a celebrity would be a part of it. Vincent Price. A contract was signed for 130 hour-long episodes, but there was one problem. They didn't know Vincent!Discover the fascinating journey of how this quirky 1970's Canadian cult-classic began, as told by the original crew.
response.tagline: The story of a kids' TV show from the '70's that got its start because Vincent Price said, 'yes'!
response.title: Behind the Castle Doors: The Origin of The Hilarious House of Frightenstein
